title: Good New Wave books?
content:
I’m looking for good books on New Wave design, besides the obvious stuff about Weingart, Brody, and Poyner’s _No More Rules…_. Any suggestions?

 [‹ Cyrillic Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212015654/http:/typophile.com/node/41833 "Go to previous forum topic") [Book Design in Hell ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212015654/http:/typophile.com/node/41767 "Go to next forum topic")
author: James Puckett

comments.content: I suggest you see if you can find Wet Magazine ( it’s not porn ) from LA in the 80’s it was a bathing magazine. But a lot of the visual tropes that are associated with the 80’s show up in there.

What about [Factory Records: The Complete Graphic Album](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212015654/http:/www.amazon.com/Factory-Records-Complete-Graphic-Album/dp/0811856763)? I was reading it the other day, and I loved Saville’s album work.

Computer Graphic II  
ISBN-88-7070-102-6

April Greiman  
Hybrid Imagery
